[quote=“Ill Pk You, post:12, topic:281637”]Go to Rune Server, Forums, Tutorial Section and there you will find something called [iPanel].

Go to that and add it to your server.[/quote]

item.title: Command Help Mantas
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“studsparky, post:1, topic:324221”]I’ve seen servers that have server event managers, for example… even if your off line, it can add owner, mod, admin, give someone items, and amount of items, it can jail, mute, etc. how do you get those on your server?

also, how do you make a ::bank, ::mantas, and ::staffmeeting commands? Thanks! :)[/quote]

commands are really easy, take one out of your source and edit it…

Read full topic

item.description:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mantas”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(391, 27);
sendMessage(“Mantas!”);

	 }

please help?
